"Phrases"
{
	"Survivors"
	{
		"en"			"Survivors"
	}

	"Infected"
	{
		"en"			"Infected"
	}

	"Spectators"
	{
		"en"			"Spectators"
	}

	"Hunting rifle limit - At maximum"
	{
		"en"			"Your team has already picked up the maximum amount of hunting rifles."
	}

	"Hunting rifle limit - Not allowed"
	{
		"en"			"Hunting rifle is not allowed."
	}

	"Pause - *SPEC*"
	{
		"en"			"*SPEC*"
	}

	"Pause - Request"
	{
		"#format"		"{1:s},{2:s},{3:s}"
		"en"			"The {1} have requested a pause. The {2} can accept with the {3:s} command."
	}

	"Pause - Accepted"
	{
		"#format"		"{1:s}"
		"en"			"Both teams have agreed to pause. Use {1} to resume the game."
	}

	"Pause - Disabled"
	{
		"en"			"Pausing have been disabled."
	}

	"Pause - Not from rcon"
	{
		"en"			"Pause cannot be used from rcon."
	}

	"Pause - Spectators can not pause"
	{
		"en"			"Spectators can not pause the game."
	}

	"Pause - Already paused"
	{
		"#format"		"{1:s}"
		"en"			"Game is already paused. Use {1} to resume the game."
	}

	"Pause - Forced"
	{
		"en"			"The game has been paused by an admin."
	}

	"Force pause - Not from rcon"
	{
		"en"			"Force pause cannot be used from rcon."
	}

	"Unpause - Not from rcon"
	{
		"en"			"Unpause cannot be used from rcon.
	}

	"Unpause - Game is not paused"
	{
		"#format"		"{1:s}"
		"en"			"The game is not paused, you can request a pause with the {1} command."
	}

	"Unpuase - Already unpausing"
	{
		"en"			"The game is already unpausing."
	}

	"Unpause - Resuming"
	{
		"#format"		"{1:s}"
		"en"			"The {1:s} unpaused the game."
	}

	"Unpause - Spectators can not unpause"
	{
		"en"			"Spectators can not unpause the game."
	}

	"Unpause - Only admin can unpause"
	{
		"#format"		"{1:s}"
		"en"			"The game was paused by an admin and can only be unpaused with {1}."
	}

	"Unpause - Forced"
	{
		"en"			"The game has been unpaused by an admin."
	}

	"Unpause - Countdown - Will resume"
	{
		"#format"		"{1:i}"
		"en"			"Game will resume in {1}..."
	}

	"Unpause - Countdown"
	{
		"#format"		"{1:i}"
		"en"			"{1}..."
	}

	"Unpause - Countdown - Done"
	{
		"en"			"Game is Live!"
	}
}
